data.title: Wilfrid Laurier University
data.meta_description: Welcome to BCG at Wilfrid Laurier University! Explore BCG events on your campus, reach out to recruiting contacts, and learn more about the application process.
data.text:
A Message From Our Team

​​​​​​​Hello and a warm welcome to BCG at Wilfrid Laurier University, where you will find information about our recruiting team and our application procedures.

On behalf of the Recruiting Team for Wilfrid Laurier University, we are thrilled at your interest in strategy consulting, and specifically in BCG! We think you will find that BCG has a great deal to offer you as a career choice and a life experience.

If you are interested but not yet ready to apply for a job, please create a profile here and tell us about yourself. If you have previously registered, you may sign in at any time to update your profile information.

​​​​​​​

Reema Castelino, Talent Acquisition Director
